result.name: department-for-environment-food-and-rural-affairs-defra-interface-to-government-gateway
result.notes: Database containing a sub-set of personal information required to authenticate users of Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra) systems against the Government Gateway.  The primary source of the personal information is the business application making use of this common service.

organization.name: department-for-environment-food-and-rural-affairs
organization.title: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
organization.description:
We are the UK government department responsible for policy and regulations on environmental, food and rural issues. Our priorities are to grow the rural economy, improve the environment and safeguard animal and plant health.

Defra is a ministerial department, supported by 38 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-environment-food-rural-affairs

result.title: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra)  Interface to Government Gateway

extras.value: Currently not for publication:  Contains Personal and National Security data
